actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend Public Law 85-445 to authorize and request the President to proclaim annually the seven day period beginning June 1 as "National Safe Boating Week".

summary.text: Amends existing Federal law to change the date for celebrating "National Safe Boating Week" to the week beginning June 1 (presently the week which includes July 4).

titles.title: A bill to amend Public Law 85-445 to authorize and request the President to proclaim annually the seven day period beginning June 1 as "National Safe Boating Week".
